snippet: Apple’s shares jumped, helping to lift the S.& P. 500 and the Nasdaq composite index modestly, but the Dow Jones industrial average closed marginally lower.
abstract: Stock market shows little change in quiet trading, as Standard & Poor's 500-stock index reaches another nominal record high.
lead_paragraph: Apple’s shares jumped, helping to lift the S.& P. 500 and the Nasdaq composite index modestly, but the Dow Jones industrial average closed marginally lower.

headline.seo: S.&P. 500 Hits Record in Quiet Trading
headline.main: S.&P. 500 Hits Record in Quiet Trading
headline.print_headline: S.&P. 500 Hits Record in Quiet Trading
